events.message: I just received the smartphone I ordered, but the screen has a large scratch right in the middle. It looks defective.
The reported issue is categorized as a product defect based on the description of a scratched screen.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle the defective product case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the scratched screen on your smartphone. I’m here to help you resolve this issue.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratch and confirm when you received the product?
Here is the photo of the scratch on the screen. I received the phone just two days ago, and noticed it immediately.
Thank you for the photo. We can either offer you a replacement unit at no additional cost or arrange a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to go ahead with a replacement. Please let me know the next steps to return the defective phone.
We have arranged the replacement shipment and sent you a prepaid return label for the defective phone. Expect delivery within five business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your replacement smartphone has arrived in good condition and that you are satisfied with the solution.
We are closing this case as resolved. Please contact us again if you have any further issues or questions.
